description: A knitted sweater in soft wool that is ethically produced and traceable. A timeless model with a round neck and ribbed cuffs, and with all of wool’s fantastic functional properties. It wicks moisture away and continues to warm even when damp. It is also temperature regulating which makes the sweater comfortable to wear both in warm and cold conditions. A versatile mid layer that is just as suitable for hiking, hunting and forest life as for everyday use.
name: Fjallraven Ovik Round-Neck Sweater - Mens
